bibl.title: Medical record of John Francis Hanney, by R.O. White, April 6, 1923

div1.p: The medical record for Hanney describes his serum treatment for yellow fever and subsequent death.

div1.head: Medical record of John Francis Hanney, by R.O. White, April 6, 1923
div1.p:
NAME OF PATIENT John Francis Hanney SEX Male AGE 39
NOMBRE DEL ENFERMO SEXO EDAD

RACE English NATIONALITY British RESIDENCE Cape Coast, W. A.
RAZA NACIONALIDAD RESIDENCIA

PREVIOUS RESIDENCE IN TROPICAL REGION, WHERE AND WHEN?
{HA RESIDIDO PREVIAMENTE EN REGIONES TROPICALES? {DÓNDE Y CUÁNDO? Sierra Leone 1921 - Hong Kong
at an earlier date.

PREVIOUS RESIDENCE IN REGION AFFECTED BY YELLOW FEVER. WHERE AND WHEN?
{HA RESIDIDO PREVIAMENTE EN REGIONES AFECTADAS POR LA FIEBRE AMARILLA? {DÓNDE Y CUÁNDO?
Not a resident - first time in Gold Coast - arrived at Cape Evart from
steamer on March 16th, 1923.

WAS THE PATIENT VACCINATED? No WHEN? ______________ NO. OF INJECTIONS ______________
{FUE VACUNADO? {CUÁNDO? NÚMERO DE INYECCIONES

DATE OF ONSET OF YELLOW FEVER became obviously ill on April 3rd.
FECHA DE LOS PRIMEROS SINTOMAS DE LA FIEBRE AMARILLA

HOW MANY HOURS AFTER ONSET WAS THE FIRST INJECTION OF SERUM GIVEN? 55
{CUÁNTAS HORAS DESPUÉS DE LOS PRIMEROS SINTOMAS SE ADMINISTRÓ LA PRIMERA INYECCIÓN DE SUERO?

CONDITION OF PATIENT AT TIME OF FIRST INJECTION: TEMPERATURE 104.F PULSE 100
ESTADO DEL PACIENTE EN EL MOMENTO DE LA PRIMERA INYECCIÓN: TEMPERATURA______________ PULSO_____________

ALMUBINURIA? ICTERUS? HEMORRHAGE (GINGIVAL, NASAL, GASTRIC, INTESTINAL, ETC.)? Almubinura first time
{ALBUMINURIA? {ICTERO? {HEMORRAGIA (GINGIVAL, NASAL, GASTRICA, INTESTINAL, ETC.)? 4 p.m. April 5th
4 shortly before death.

AMOUNT OF FIRST INJECTION 20 C.C. (intravenously)
{CANTIDAD ADMINISTRADA EN LA PRIMERA INYECCIÓN?

NUMBER AND AMOUNT OF SUBSEQUENT INJECTIONS___________________WHEN GIVEN?________________
NÚMERO Y DOSIS DE LAS INYECCIONES SUBSIGUIENTES Y CUÁNDO SE ADMINISTRARON?____________________

RESULTS OF TREATMENT (MENTION WHETHER THERE WAS ANY STRIKING SUBJECTIVE OR OBJECTIVE IMPROVEMENT
RESULTADOS DEL TRATAMIENTO (ESPECIFIQUESE SI HABÍA ALGUNA MEJORIA VISIBLE SUBJETIVA O OBJETIVA followed
immediately by black vomit, profuse perspiration - unconsciousness and death two hours later.

DATE OF DEATH 3.30 A.M. April 6th.
FECHA DEL FALLECIMIENTO
div1.closer:
R. O. White
PHYSICIAN IN CHARGE
EL JEFE DE SERVICIO S.M.O.
FORM NO. 215
